Celebrate a Life

Create Lasting Meaning in Someone's Honor

Transform your tribute into opportunities that inspire, empower, and connect people to change their world.

Memorial Gifts

Honor someone special while supporting our mission to create lasting change.

  • Beautiful acknowledgment sent to family
  • Amount remains confidential
  • Meaningful alternative to flowers
Make a Memorial Gift

Honorary Gifts

Celebrate birthdays, anniversaries, or other special occasions in a meaningful way.

  • Customizable e-card notification
  • Physical card option available
  • Perfect for "in lieu of gifts" occasions
Make an Honorary Gift

How Notification Works

Electronic Card

Select and send an e-card immediately after completing your gift online.

Physical Card

Email us at dagogopollyn@gmail.com with your message for mailing.

Bank Transfer Information

For mailed tribute gifts, please include honoree details in the transfer reference
